name: auth_users_exposed
title: Exposed Auth Users
description: Detects if auth.users is exposed to anon or authenticated roles via a view or materialized view in schemas exposed to PostgREST, potentially compromising user data security.
detail: View/Materialized View "user_roles_view" in the public schema may expose \`auth.users\` data to anon or authenticated roles.

name: auth_users_exposed
title: Exposed Auth Users
description: Detects if auth.users is exposed to anon or authenticated roles via a view or materialized view in schemas exposed to PostgREST, potentially compromising user data security.
detail: View/Materialized View "v_users" in the public schema may expose \`auth.users\` data to anon or authenticated roles.

name: policy_exists_rls_disabled
title: Policy Exists RLS Disabled
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) policies have been created, but RLS has not been enabled for the underlying table.
detail: Table \`public.profiles\` has RLS policies but RLS is not enabled on the table. Policies include {profiles_self_insert,profiles_self_select,profiles_self_update}.

name: security_definer_view
title: Security Definer View
description: Detects views defined with the SECURITY DEFINER property. These views enforce Postgres permissions and row level security policies (RLS) of the view creator, rather than that of the querying user
detail: View \`public.v_users\` is defined with the SECURITY DEFINER property

name: security_definer_view
title: Security Definer View
description: Detects views defined with the SECURITY DEFINER property. These views enforce Postgres permissions and row level security policies (RLS) of the view creator, rather than that of the querying user
detail: View \`public.user_roles_view\` is defined with the SECURITY DEFINER property

name: rls_disabled_in_public
title: RLS Disabled in Public
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) has not been enabled on tables in schemas exposed to PostgREST
detail: Table \`public.advocate_clients\` is public, but RLS has not been enabled.

name: rls_disabled_in_public
title: RLS Disabled in Public
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) has not been enabled on tables in schemas exposed to PostgREST
detail: Table \`public.profiles\` is public, but RLS has not been enabled.
